name: MLCPaddingLayer
desc: A layer that pads a tensor with the padding sizes you specify.

items.name: init(reflectionPadding: [Int])
items.desc: Creates a padding layer with the reflection padding sizes you specify.

items.name: init(symmetricPadding: [Int])
items.desc: Creates a padding layer with the symmetric padding sizes you specify.

items.name: init(zeroPadding: [Int])
items.desc: Creates a padding layer with the zero padding sizes you specify.

items.name: init(constantPadding: [Int], constantValue: Float)
items.desc: Creates a padding layer with the constant padding sizes and constant value you specify.

items.name: var constantValue: Float
items.desc: The constant value you use if padding type is constant.
